value.string:
# Look if there is a corresponding trade conditions and then copy all values
 
 order = context
 trade_condition_list = []
 
 trade_condition_portal_type = 'Sale Trade Condition'
 trade_condition_list = order.getSpecialiseValueList(portal_type=(trade_condition_portal_type,))
 
 if len(trade_condition_list) == 0 :
 trade_condition_list = context.portal_domains.searchPredicateList(order,portal_type=(trade_condition_portal_type,),test=0)
 context.log('trade_condition_list,',trade_condition_list)
 # Results
 if len(trade_condition_list ) == 0 :
 redirect_url = '%s/%s?%s' % ( context.absolute_url(), form_id
 , 'portal_status_message=No+Trade+Condition.')
 elif len(trade_condition_list ) > 1 :
 redirect_url = '%s/%s?%s' % ( context.absolute_url(), form_id
 , 'portal_status_message=Too+many+Trade+Condition.')
 else : 
 trade_condition=trade_condition_list[0].getObject()
 
 # Update Order Profile
 categories = order.getCategoryList()
 # Date
 if order.getReceivedDate() is None :
 context.setReceivedDate(DateTime())
 
 # Source
 if ((order.getSourceValue() == None) or force == 1) and trade_condition.getSourceValue() is not None :
 order.setSourceList((trade_condition.getSourceRelativeUrl(),))
 # source_section
 if ((order.getSourceSectionValue() is None) or force == 1) and \
 (trade_condition.getSourceSectionValue() is not None) :
 order.setSourceSectionList((trade_condition.getSourceSectionRelativeUrl(),))
 # source_decision
 if ((order.getSourceDecisionValue() is None) or force == 1) and \
 (trade_condition.getSourceDecisionValue() is not None) :
 order.setSourceDecisionList( (trade_condition.getSourceDecisionRelativeUrl(),))
 # source_administration
 if ((order.getSourceAdministrationValue() is None) or force == 1) and \
 (trade_condition.getSourceAdministrationValue() is not None) :
 order.setSourceAdministrationList((trade_condition.getSourceAdministrationRelativeUrl(),))
 # source_payment
 if ((order.getSourcePaymentValue() is None) or force == 1) and \
 (trade_condition.getSourcePaymentValue() is not None) :
 order.setSourcePaymentList(trade_condition.getSourcePaymentRelativeUrl(),)
 
 # DESTINATION_section
 if (order.getDestinationSectionValue() is None) or force == 1 :
 # if destination_section is not defined on TradeCondition, use Order destination
 if trade_condition.getDestinationSectionValue() is not None :
 order.setDestinationSectionList((trade_condition.getDestinationSectionRelativeUrl(),))
 elif trade_condition.getDestinationValue() is not None :
 order.setDestinationSectionList((order.getDestinationRelativeUrl(),))
 # Destination
 if (order.getDestinationValue() is None) or force == 1 :
 # if destination is not defined on TradeCondition, use Order destination_section
 if trade_condition.getDestinationValue() is not None :
 order.setDestinationList( (trade_condition.getDestinationRelativeUrl(),))
 elif order.getDestinationSectionValue() is not None:
 order.setDestinationList((order.getDestinationRelativeUrl(),))
 # destination_decision
 if (len(order.getDestinationDecisionValueList()) == 0) or force == 1 :
 # if destination_decision is not defined on TradeCondition, use Order destination
 if len(trade_condition.getDestinationDecisionValueList()) >0 :
 for object in trade_condition.getDestinationDecisionValueList():
 order.setDestinationDecisionList( (object.getRelativeUrl(),))
 elif order.getDestinationValue() is not None:
 order.setDestinationDecisionList((order.getDestinationRelativeUrl(),))
 # destination_administration
 if (order.getDestinationAdministrationValue() is None) or force == 1 :
 # if destination_administration is not defined on TradeCondition, use Order destination
 if trade_condition.getDestinationAdministrationValue() is not None :
 order.setDestinationAdministrationList((trade_condition.getDestinationAdministrationValue().getRelativeUrl(),))
 elif order.getDestinationValue() is not None:
 order.setDestinationAdministrationList( (order.getDestinationRelativeUrl(),))
 # destination_payment
 if (order.getDestinationPaymentValue() is None) or force == 1 :
 # if destination_payment is not defined on TradeCondition, use Order destination
 if trade_condition.getDestinationPaymentValue() is not None :
 order.setDestinationPaymentList((trade_condition.getDestinationPaymentRelativeUrl(),))
 elif order.getDestinationValue() is not None:
 order.setDestinationPaymentList((order.getDestinationRelativeUrl(),))
 
 # Devise
 if ((order.getPriceCurrencyValue() is None) or force == 1) and \
 (trade_condition.getPriceCurrencyValue() is not None) :
 order.setPriceCurrencyList((trade_condition.getPriceCurrencyValue().getRelativeUrl(),))
 
 
 if ((order.getDeliveryModeValue() is None) or force == 1) and \
 (trade_condition.getDeliveryModeValue() is not None) :
 order.setDeliveryModeList((trade_condition.getDeliveryModeValue().getRelativeUrl(),))
 
 # copy PaymentCondition if no one is defined on Order
 payment_condition_portal_type = 'Payment Condition'
 if (len(order.contentIds(filter={'portal_type':payment_condition_portal_type})) == 0) or force == 1 :
 if force ==1:
 to_delete=order.contentIds(filter={'portal_type':payment_condition_portal_type})
 order.manage_delObjects(to_delete)
 to_copy=[]
 to_copy=trade_condition.contentIds(filter={'portal_type':payment_condition_portal_type})
 if len(to_copy)>0 :
 copy_data = trade_condition.manage_copyObjects(ids=to_copy)
 new_id_list = order.manage_pasteObjects(copy_data)
 
 # Incoterm
 if ((order.getIncotermValue() is None) or force == 1) and \
 (trade_condition.getIncotermValue() is not None) :
 order.setIncotermList( (trade_condition.getIncotermValue().getRelativeUrl(),))
 
 # copy Discount if no one is defined on Order
 discount_portal_type = 'Discount'
 if (len(order.contentIds(filter={'portal_type':discount_portal_type})) == 0) or force == 1 :
 if force ==1:
 to_delete=order.contentIds(filter={'portal_type':discount_portal_type})
 order.manage_delObjects(to_delete)
 to_copy=[]
 to_copy=trade_condition.contentIds(filter={'portal_type':discount_portal_type})
 if len(to_copy)>0 :
 copy_data = trade_condition.manage_copyObjects(ids=to_copy)
 new_id_list = order.manage_pasteObjects(copy_data)
 
 # Update specialise value of Order
 order.setSpecialiseList((trade_condition.getRelativeUrl(),))
 order.recursiveReindexObject()
 
 redirect_url = '%s/%s?%s' % (context.absolute_url(), form_id, 
 'portal_status_message=Order+updated.')
 
 if batch_mode:
 return None
 else:
 context.REQUEST[ 'RESPONSE' ].redirect( redirect_url )
